name: Ambassador Program

price_options.name: Standard Ambassador Program: Cost per round
price_options.notes: Our ambassador meets with clients to get talking points, experience the product, then hits about 100 downtown hotels to educate concierges and distribute materials.

price_options.name: Ambassador - Concierge Intro
price_options.notes: Ambassador takes client reps to 25 targeted hotels to make introductions.

rules: No discounts beyond ratecard above. Trade up to $500 accepted only if beneficial to Ateema.
If previously discounted, reduce discount since model changed and costs increased.

sales_strategy: Use for personal concierge relationships; emphasize credibility and personal touch.
